title: Life Signs and Fortune Cookies: Stories and Poems of a Strange but Beautiful Life
description: This collection of poems and short stories by Melanie Simms (all previously published in magazines, newspapers, and poetry journals) related to personal situations and experiences throughout her life. Included in this volume: The Fortune CookieLife Signs and Fortune CookiesIsaiahThe Snow ManWaiting for JackOnline LoversThe VisitorLittle Green MenOne More HeroThe Recipe Box
author: Melanie Simms
